bibl.title: Back to a Monolithic Jewish World?
bibl.note: Article compte rendu de: Erich S. GRUEN, Heritage and Hellenism. The Reinvention of Jewish Tradition = Hellenistic Culture and Society. 30 (Berkeley - Los Angeles - London, 1998). - Nombreux renvois à la situation en Égypte.
